TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TableCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub TableCallback(tableData As ICollection)
type TableCallback = delegate of ICollection -> unit

Docs.param: The data to retrieve from the provider.
Docs.summary: References the method to call when retrieving table data from a provider.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When a Web Parts control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartTable> interface and serves as a provider in a Web Parts connection, the consumer or transformer must retrieve and process the table data from the provider. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TableCallback> delegate represents the method to call for processing the provider data.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartTable.GetTableData%2A> method contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TableCallback> delegate parameter.
## Examples The following code example contains a Web Parts control named `TableProviderWebPart` that serves as a provider of data in the form of a table. The control includes an implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IWebPartTable.GetTableData%2A> method, which receives a parameter of type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TableCallback>. This method calls the method represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TableCallback> delegate passing the table data.
[!code-csharp[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/CS/tableprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/VB/tableprovider.vb#1)]
In the `OnPreRender` method, the consumer calls `GetTableData` in `TableProviderWebPart` and passes its `GetTableData` method as the delegate to call with the table data, as shown in the following code example.
[!code-csharp[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/CS/tableconsumerwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/VB/tableconsumerwebpart.vb#2)]
The two controls and the connection are included in a Web page, as shown in the following example.
[!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/CS/TableConnection.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/VB/TableConnection.aspx#3)]
